title: Ausbildung.de Jobs Scraper
description: Extract apprenticeship and training positions from Ausbildung.de. Supports JSON API and HTML parsing with comprehensive filtering options.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Ausbildung.de search URL. If provided, this overrides keyword/location/beruf filters.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Job title or keyword to search for, e.g., 'Fachinformatiker', 'Kaufmann', 'Mechatroniker'.

location.title: Location (Wo)
location.description: City or location to search in, e.g., 'Berlin', 'MÃ¼nchen', 'Hamburg'.

beruf.title: Profession/Job Type
beruf.description: Specific profession or job type to filter by (optional).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job detail page to extract complete descriptions and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect. Set to a lower number for testing.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of search result pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for best results with Ausbildung.de.
